items.sentence: Tom wanted Mary to help him clean the living room.
I\'ll answer your questions with complete honesty.
Tom was there for me when I really needed someone.
We already have three events booked for next week.
Tom bought that pair of shoes at a clearance sale.
Tom can take a couple of weeks off if he needs to.
We still don\'t know what Tom is going to do next.
We still don\'t know what Tom wants us to do next.
We still haven\'t taken down our Christmas lights.
I need to be in Boston by 2:30 tomorrow afternoon.
